title: BIP 25 - Grants Month 2
body:
TLDR; Determine Badger Grants for Month 2.

Overview:
- Outline who should receive month 2 grants from the treasury
- The responsibilities of those receiving grants
- Total $BADGER Allocation for month 2 = 16,460 $BADGER

Link to discussions and details of grant recipients: https://forum.badger.finance/t/bip-25-grants-month-2/1965
author: 0xa001B5639e4ed26dF58367016eB08850e3e55655
